label: A_tP16_138_j-001
title: Cl ($A18$) Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments: As given, this structure has a Cl-Cl bond distance of 1.82{\AA}, far too small for chlorine. The structure was eventually reanalyzed, and found to be similar to \href{current_web_home_dir/A_oC8_64_f-003}{molecular iodine ($A14$)}. See (Donohue, 1982, p. 396) for details. We retain this structure for its historical interest. Note that all atoms are on the general sites of space group $P4_{2}/ncm$ \#138.
